CustomField.formula: IF( vlocity_ps__PartyType__c == 'Household', 'Households', IF( vlocity_ps__PartyType__c == 'Contact' || ISBLANK(vlocity_ps__PartyId__c) , 'People',IF (vlocity_ps__PartyType__c =='Account' && vlocity_ps__IsPersonAccount__c == true, 'People', 'Accounts')))
CustomField.label: Party Type Plural
